text: Burgenlandkreis is a district in Saxony-Anhalt, Germany. It was formed by joining the old districts of Burgenlandkreis and Weißenfels as part of the boundary changes of 2007. On 16 July 2007 the district parliament decided to change the name back to Burgenlandkreis from 1 August 2007.Namechange announcement ==Towns and municipalities== Free towns Free municipalities # Bad Kösen # Hohenmölsen # Naumburg # Elsteraue Verwaltungsgemeinschaften Verwaltungsgemeinschaften Verwaltungsgemeinschaften * 1.
